body: I tried Hail of Blades on the NEW WUKONG...

replies.body:
hail of blades, if not going to attack speed cap, has diminishing returns for every other % of bonus attack speed that you have.
now wukong being an attack reset catagory, you are better off on hp tank scaling dmg with titanic and 0% bonus attack speed aside from innate growth(lvls) and any team bonuses

ignite/smite
